ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I have embedded Heritrix into an information sytsem I wrote and there I call its API directly. Until recently I have used Heritrix 1.2 under JDK 1.4. Now I

From: "Holger Stenzhorn" <holger@...>
Subject: Embedded Heritrix 1.4.0 works under JDK 1.5 but not under 1.4.2
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=81478527; y=8Kcb8ZEDlIs8bmkxBbireLJPVPtVRp0SL60jQ22oMK5SLp1rSX1kzrPR
X-Yahoo-Profile: holgerstenzhorn

Hi,

I have embedded Heritrix into an information sytsem I wrote and there
I call its API directly.

Until recently I have used Heritrix 1.2 under JDK 1.4. Now I have
updated to Heritrix 1.4 (with JDK 1.4) and get the following error
message: "name is not a valid java type (or is a reserved word):
settings-directory"

If I use JDK 1.5 everything works fine - but for a costumer I need to
use JDK 1.4.

When I took a look at the MANIFEST in the JAR file of Heritrix I saw
that it was compiled with JDK 1.5. So I rebuild Heritrix from the
sources with JDK 1.4.

But still the above described error happens as before.

Thanks in advance for your help,
Holger
